segments.text: This is a nice set of wheels . How much did the dealer charge you for this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A lot . I probably got to moonlight for the rest of my life , but so what , it ’ s worth it . Come on , get in . Let ’ s take a drive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay then , let ’ s go fast ! Whoa ! This thing can really accelerate fast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Check out what happens when I put on the brakes suddenly . It can stop quickly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey , just watch out for cops or you ’ re gonna end up in the slammer . You know you tend to go fast ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know it . I went through my last set of tires fast . I even had three flat tires in two weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now watch ... some guys probably run a light and hit your car .
segments.speaker: S1
